about_the_game:
A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, they head to the library with the intention of studying, only to find themselves distracted.

GAME DESCRIPTION

“College Sex” is an erotic visual novel series that follows the story of two attractive young women and their naughty experiences in college.
Ivy and Jade are forced to find a quiet place to study when the music in their dorm rooms becomes too loud.
They head to the library, where they meet a flirtatious librarian who allows them to get in without their student IDs.
Once inside, the girls quickly become distracted by a certain “sex list” that’s been making rounds on campus.
They begin to fantasize about all the places they want to have sex before they graduate, and before long, they’re putting their plans into action.
We promise you a steamy story with high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters.

FEATURES

- HD renders and animations
- Video and image gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Sexual blackmail themes.
Contains lesbian and straight sex scenes.

name: College Sex - Episode 9

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
